title: TextBox height or width can beyond 2048 pixel limitation.
body: I understand the max size limitation to control. And there are some approach to work around on most of the controls. However, for some control, e.g. TextBox, it's a big problem.

comments.body: I forgot to mention that I am experiencing this on windows phone 7 and it has been confirmed by a former team member that this is the issue you have described
I have a problem where the textbox only allows ~45 lines of code at fontsize of 30 px...I am not sure if this is the problem you are describing, but this is very irritating for long text input
